metadata.title: CVE-2019-15939 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in OpenCV 4.1.0. There is a divide-by-zero error in cv::HOGDescriptor::getDescriptorSize in modules/objdetect/src/hog.cpp.

criterions.comment: opencv package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3').
